name: Grilled Stuffed Mushrooms
author: xxswampratxx09
summary: My grandmother used to make these grilled stuffed mushrooms for special occasions and all of us kids loved them.
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels and finely chop
Mix cooked bacon, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, green onions, egg, garlic powder, and pepper together in a large bowl
Load mushroom caps evenly with mixture
Cook mushrooms on the preheated grill until cheese is melted and slightly brown, 8 to 10 minutes
